C

ChooseFirst - Class in gui
Class implementing a window for selecting whether the player or the agent goes first
ChooseFirst() - Constructor for class gui.ChooseFirst
Creates a window for selecting whether the player or the agent goes first
ChooseFirstController - Class in controller
Class providing the controller for the processes related to the selection of the first player to move
ChooseFirstController(ChooseFirst, GameMaster) - Constructor for class controller.ChooseFirstController
Creates a controller object with the GUI for the selection of the first player to move and the game master as parameters
ChooseLevel - Class in gui
Class implementing a window for the selection of the intelligence level of the agent
ChooseLevel() - Constructor for class gui.ChooseLevel
Creates a window for the selection of the intelligence level of the agent
ChooseLevelController - Class in controller
Class providing the controller for the processes related to the selection of the intelligence level of the tic-tac-toe-playing agent
ChooseLevelController(ChooseLevel, GameMaster) - Constructor for class controller.ChooseLevelController
Creates a controller object with the GUI for the selection of the intelligence level of the agent and the game master as parameters
clearBoard() - Method in class tic_tac_toe.GameMaster
Configures this board back to its initial state, that is, 9 unoccupied tiles arranged into 3 rows and 3 columns
COMPUTER_TOKEN - Static variable in class tic_tac_toe.Board
Character code to denote that a tile is occupied by the tic-tac-toe-playing agent (also the character code of the tic-tac-toe-playing agent/computer)
controller - package controller
Provides classes for the controllers connecting the front- and back-ends of the game, following the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture
Coordinates - Class in util
Class implementing a pair of coordinates (row- and column-coordinates) to describe the location of tiles in the 3×3 tic-tac-toe board
Coordinates(int, int) - Constructor for class util.Coordinates
Creates a pair of coordinates given the row- and column-coordinates
